00029 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_
00030 #define ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00033 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00034 #include "Identifiable.hpp"
00035 
00042 class AbstractCellProperty : public Identifiable
00043 {
00044 private:
00045 
00049     unsigned mCellCount;
00050 
00052     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00059     template<class Archive>
00060     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00061     {
00062         archive & mCellCount;
00063     }
00064 
00065 public:
00069     AbstractCellProperty();
00070 
00074     virtual ~AbstractCellProperty();
00075 
00087     template<class CLASS>
00088     bool IsType() const
00089     {
00090         CLASS ref_obj;
00091         return IsSame(&ref_obj);
00092     }
00093 
00101     template<class BASECLASS>
00102     bool IsSubType() const
00103     {
00104         // We put a const_cast in here so users don't have to worry about whether the
00105         // property object they are testing is const or not.
00106         BASECLASS* p_subclass = dynamic_cast<BASECLASS*>(const_cast<AbstractCellProperty*>(this));
00107         return (p_subclass != NULL);
00108     }
00109 
00114     bool IsSame(const AbstractCellProperty* pOther) const;
00115 
00120     bool IsSame(boost::shared_ptr<const AbstractCellProperty> pOther) const;
00121 
00125     void IncrementCellCount();
00126 
00130     void DecrementCellCount();
00131 
00135     unsigned GetCellCount() const;
00136 
00137 };
00138 
00139 #endif /* ABSTRACTCELLPROPERTY_HPP_ */
